paper_title: Disordered layers and dimerization in the crystal structure of TaOCl2

claims.claim: Claim is that dimerisation of Ta atoms in TaOCl2 results in a flat band at the Fermi level in the electronic band structure while undistorted TaOCl2 has a band with a ~2.5 eV bandwidth.
instruction: Install Quantum Espresso or equivalent DFT code
Open setup file for Quantum Espresso and set following parameters
Use functional PBE: GGA functional with PBEsol
Set convergence for total energy to 10^-5 eV
Set convergence for change in potential to 10^-7 eV
Set all other parameters to defaults as no other parameters were specified in paper
Construct cif file from tables 2 and 3 in paper
Add atomic strucutre informaiton to Quantum Espresso setup file
Run ground state electron density calculation to convergence
Calculate band structure and density of states
Repeat steps 2-11 with cif file information from tables 4 and 5
Compare band structures and density of states to figures 10 and 11 in the paper; the results should be qualitatively similar
